description:
This component represents the core assembly of the Kingo.BuildingBlocks framework. It provides
      all kinds of basic utility features and classes that are primarily useful when developing
      message-driven Business Applications.
      
      The core assembly contains all fundamental types and
      classes of the framework, such as the Message, Clock, StringTemplate and other classes that
      could or should have been part of the .NET Framework itself. It also contains a special kind
      of implementation of the Specification Pattern, which can be used for various purposes, such as
      message validation with a ConstraintValidator as well as implementing business rules.            
      
      Source code and general guidance on how to use this framework can be found here:
      https://github.com/wimvangool/Kingo.BuildingBlocks/wiki
summary: A core utility assembly primarily useful for development of message-driven Business Applications.
title: Kingo.BuildingBlocks
